title: Open System - Async API Application Executor
description: Generates Async API application project code and Data Contracts based on an AsyncApi spec

templateName.description: Name of the template to generate

outputPath.description: Path to the directory where the files will be generated

pdf.description: Set to `true` to get index.pdf generated next to your index.html

png.description: Set to `true` to get index.png generated next to your index.html

svg.description: Set to `true` to get index.svg generated next to your index.html

maxTextSize.description: It is possible that in case of an extremely large Async-API document default mermaid recommended text size will not be enough. Then you need to explicitly make it larger

user.description: The user to the AMQP broker

password.description: The password to the AMQP broker
